comments:
When using the Generic Recording Framework , and you specify you want to create a test from existing recording you get the error seen below.  This worked in 4.1.  It might be related to changing the Test.UI plugin from a plugin directory to a jar.

To reproduce the error do a File->Test Element->Test From Recording.  Select the radio button for 'Create Test from Existing Recording' and highlight HTTP Recording, then click Next.  Find the project and expand the project.  When I expand the project, I get the error above.

Fixed.

Please use o.e.h.test.ui.TestUIImage image factory instead of loading image directly.

Thanks
*** Bug 131947 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 134281 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
ACTION: Please update the target to the release AND iteration that this defect was returned/fixed.

Closing by default since not closed by the originator in the 7+ months since being resolved.  

Please reopen if the issue is still present in the latest TPTP release or the resolution is not correct.
